entry.title: Full Stack Developper - Python/Django + Angular
entry.summary: If you are a Python Developer with Front-end development experience, please read on!
entry.content:
Located in Paris, we are a profitable start-up that is developing a B2B social network based product which is aiming to disrupt the business relationship between African and European companies.

This platform provides the rating (Finance, Operation, Social & Environment) of african companies which helps European companies search, find and select the best african companies to work with.

Top reasons to work with us

  • Profitable: We are already a profitable venture after only 14 months, that is a 2x revenue growth over the last period.
  • International: We have more than 6 nationalities in our team and opening offices abroad
  • Technologies: We use cutting edge technologies such as ElasticSearch, Graph Database and Angular.

What You Need for this Position

  • 3-5 years of Python/Django Programming experience
  • Hunger for new frontend framework: Angular.js
  • Strong JavaScript skills: D3, Jquery
  • Extensive SQL skills: postgreSQL
  • solid understanding of Linux development/deployment
  • Diploma in Computer Science or related is preferred

What's In It for You

  • Full-time contract (French CDI)
  • Solid base salary, Bonuses and benefits
  • Generous start up equity
  • A great and fun working environment
  • Did I say that we have an awesome international team?
  • AND...if you bring along a talented intern to join our team (6 months), we will reward you in cash!

How to apply

  • Email your resume to: amelia.ponde@labadens.eu
  • Email subject: Full Stack Dev-2015
  • Deadline: February 2015

Applicants must be authorized to work in France.
